conversations.response: In the Bible, Gad is a prophet who appears in the books of Samuel and Chronicles. He was a seer and advisor to King David. Gad is also mentioned in the Quran as one of the prophets of Islam.
conversations.summary: The user asks who Gad is, and the AI explains that Gad is a prophet mentioned in the Bible and the Quran, known for being a seer and advisor to King David.
